title: Fractionated brain X-irradiation profoundly reduces hippocampal immature neuron numbers without affecting spontaneous behavior in mice
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): L.E. Kuil, R. Seigers, M. Loos, M.C. de Gooijer, A. Compter, W. Boogerd, O. van Tellingen, A.B. Smit, S.B. Schagen
